legacy:anathema.NAME: Anathema
legacy:anathema.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL [#eeee00]Permanently[] increase damage by !M! . NL [#ff0000]Lose[] 1 Max Hp.

legacy:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
legacy:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

legacy:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
legacy:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
legacy:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

legacy:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
legacy:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

legacy:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
legacy:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !legacy:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

legacy:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
legacy:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !legacy:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
